name: FLORAPRO™ HARDWATER + MICROS
description: FLORAPRO™ HARDWATER + MICROS is for facilities with hard water, we recommend Flora Pro™Hardwater + Micros as part of the FloraPro™nutrient system. FloraPro™ is specially formulated for high-value production crops where results and consistency are paramount. Our unique formulation and methodology produce superior results in large-scale operations. Designed from the ground up for fertilizer injection systems, FloraPro™ is easy to use and highly water soluble. Our complete and balanced formula is cost effective, scalable and consistent to meet the high standards of a competitive industry.
